006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
009
010/**
011 * Provides type information that be used to discover type information for,
012 * test, and cast various node-based item objects.
013 *
014 * @param <T>
015 *          the Java type of the node-based item supported by the implementation
016 */
017public interface IKindTest<T extends INodeItem> extends IItemType {
018  @Override
019  Class<T> getItemClass();
020}
